exclusion.criterion: Amyloid related organ dysfunction or organ syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clonal relapse after previous chemotherapy or stem cell transplant OR refractory to previous chemotherapy or stem cell transplant
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has systemic AL amyloidosis and is on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with melphalan and prednisone, followed by VAD regimen, and autologous stem cell transplant.
